---
title: "ხელოვნური ინტელექტის რესურსები"
output: distill::distill_article
---

<script>
  // Hide the main content by default
  document.body.style.display = "none";

  // Prompt for password
  let password = prompt("შეიყვანე პაროლი:");

  // Check the password
  if (password === "ai_tools") {
    document.body.style.display = "block"; // Show content for correct password
  } else {
    // If the password is wrong, show a message and the request form link
    document.body.innerHTML = `
      <h1>Access Denied</h1>
      <p>The password you entered is incorrect.</p>
      <p>If you don’t have the password, you can request it by filling out the form below:</p>
      <a href="https://forms.gle/your-google-form-link" 
         target="_blank" style="font-size: 1.2em; color: blue;">
         Request Password via Google Form
      </a>
    `;
    document.body.style.display = "block"; // Show the new content
  }
</script>

<div>
  # Protected Content
  Welcome to the protected page. This content is only visible to users with the correct password.
</div>
